Tunable.name: CARRY_BACK_WING_PROXY_OBJECT
Tunable.description: The CarryBackWingProxyObject is an object which the Sim carries on their back which acts as a proxy for controlling a fairy sim's wing visibility.

Tunable.name: FAIRY_CARRY_WING_INTERACTION
Tunable.description: The FairyCarryWingInteraction is used by the transition sequence to make a fairy pull out their wings when they have been stowed.

Tunable.name: FAIRY_SATISFY_CONSTRAINTS_INTERACTION
Tunable.description: An interaction used by the transition sequence to route a fairy closer a destination before putting their wings away.

TunableList.name: FAIRY_WING_BLOCKED_PORTAL_FLAGS
TunableList.description: Flags which denote portals a fairy should not be able to route through with their wings out.

Tunable.name: FAIRY_WING_PUTDOWN_CONSTRAINT_RADIUS
Tunable.description: The radius of the circle constraint we use to tell the fairy to put down their wings. This radius is used typically when we're finalizing the path, and is larger to allow the Sim to route near objects without failing to transition.

Tunable.name: FAIRY_WING_PUTDOWN_PATH_INTERRUPT_CONSTRAINT_RADIUS
Tunable.display: Fairy Wing Putdown Path Interrupt Constraint Radius
Tunable.description: The radius of the circle constraint we use to tell the fairy to put down their wings. This radius is used on path interrupts, which are generally blocking portals. This radius should be less than half of the wing visibility change path segment distance. If it's greater, the fairy will get stuck at portals forever.

Tunable.name: FAIRY_WING_VISIBILITY_CHANGE_PATH_SEGMENT_MINIMUM_DISTANCE
Tunable.display: Fairy Wing Visibility Change Path Segment Minimum Distance
Tunable.description: The minimum distance a route or route segment must be for a fairy to take out or put away their wings.

Tunable.name: SIM_ROUTE_SATISFY_CONSTRAINT_INTERACTION
Tunable.description: An interaction used by the transition sequence to route Sims close to a destination.

TunableTuple.name: WING_FIXUP_RULES
TunableTuple.description: Tunables related to fixing up wings on load or travel.

Tunable.name: WING_CARRY_JOINT
Tunable.description: The joint of the carrier sim to parent the carryable to.

Tunable.name: WING_FIXUP_OWNING_AFFORDANCE
Tunable.description: An interaction which we run as part of the fixup to own the object reservation and carry.
